note:
A queer, non-binary, neurodivergent disaster hamster with way too many interests to list and probably an even larger amount of disabilities.

Survives on cinnamon buns, chocolate, cuddles and puns.

Posts mainly contain knitting, video games, drawings, nature photos, swearing and general complaining about the tragicomedy that is my health.

Avatar: digital pencil drawing of a black and white hamster holding a cinnamon bun in its tiny paws

Header: close-up photo of ten orange-yellow tulips

fields.name: For the posts that are way too long
